title: Hunter
description:
I was nothing more than Shaye's English professor... among other things.She despised the fact that I was screwing her mom and always made a point in reminding me that I'm just her teacher.
"Nothing more, nothing else."
That was perfectly fine with me until the truth surfaces that Shaye isn't the girl I thought she was. That's when she became my new target. The secret society I've been apart of my whole life now have their eyes set on her, leaving me with the family inherited job: 
Hunt, Catch and Train.
Now, just as countless girls who came before her did, she'll learn complete and utter devotion to whoever claims her as their pet. Because in my world those are the qualities she needs to survive. The rest get... put down.Will I tame her? Or will she tame the beast inside me?WARNING: This story contains non-consensual sex, human trafficking, inhumane activities and questionable methods of training & punishment. 18+
author: Shantaye Brown
